revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Excito |model=B3 |revision=RF1 |asin=B004FV9T2A |manuf_country=Sweden |is_manuf=No |price=400 |est_release_date=10/2010 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=M25P16VP |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G084QF-BCF7 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=SATA, eSATA, Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes,, |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB hub controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, General Purpose CMOS Timer;NXP;ICM7555;;1;,,, 3A, 24V Input, Integrated Synchronous Buck Regulator;Fairchild;FAN2103MP;;5;,,, |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, eSATA, buzzer, metal case, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2010.06; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.39.4-11;Debian 6.0.3 |tp_firmware=Debian, Arch Linux (Arm), Gentoo, RedSleeve |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=excito |oui_eth=00:22:02 }} {{TagLine|Excito B3 "Bubba" Server}} :{{ProductPage|https://excitostore.com/}} [http://wiki.excito.com/w/index.php?title=Main_Page Wiki] *[https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=excito_b3&num=1 ''Excito B3 Mini ARM Powered Server'' on '''phoronix'''] *[https://www.expertreviews.co.uk/nas-drives/50399/excito-b3-wifi-review ''Excito B3 WiFi review'' on '''ExpertReviews'''] ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6281 ARM v5 @1.2GHz *Storage: 2MB SPI flash, SATA and eSATA *RAM: 512MB DRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 2x USB 2.0 *Power Source: DC Jack 12V ==Images== File:Excito-B3 Top.jpeg|Top of board File:Excito-B3 Bottom.jpeg|Bottom of board [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
